mapper.sql: user_id, user_name, department, pinyin, version, user_type, hire_flag
mapper.select: select from ${table} where version > ${version} and host_id = #{hostId}

SELECT user_id AS user_id, department AS department, user_name AS user_name, dep1 AS dep1, dep2 AS dep2, dep3 AS dep3, dep4 AS dep4, dep5 AS dep5, ps_deptid AS ps_deptid, gender AS gender, hire_flag AS hire_flag, user_type AS user_type, version AS version, email AS email, pinyin AS pinyin FROM host_users where hire_flag=1 and host_id=#{hostID};
mapper.insert: insert into host_users ( host_id, user_id, password, user_name, department, ps_deptid, dep1, dep2, dep3, dep4, dep5, pinyin, hire_flag, version, gender, user_type ) VALUES ( #{UserInfoQtalk.host_id}, #{UserInfoQtalk.user_id}, #{UserInfoQtalk.user_id}, #{UserInfoQtalk.user_name}, #{UserInfoQtalk.department}, #{UserInfoQtalk.ps_deptid}, #{UserInfoQtalk.dep1}, #{UserInfoQtalk.dep2}, #{UserInfoQtalk.dep3}, #{UserInfoQtalk.dep4}, #{UserInfoQtalk.dep5}, hanzi_to_pinyin(#{UserInfoQtalk.user_name}), #{UserInfoQtalk.hire_flag}, #{UserInfoQtalk.version}, #{UserInfoQtalk.gender}, #{UserInfoQtalk.user_type}) ON conflict(user_id, host_id) DO UPDATE set user_name=#{UserInfoQtalk.user_name},department=#{UserInfoQtalk.department},ps_deptid=#{UserInfoQtalk.ps_deptid},dep1=#{UserInfoQtalk.dep1}, dep2=#{UserInfoQtalk.dep2},dep3=#{UserInfoQtalk.dep3},dep4=#{UserInfoQtalk.dep4},dep5=#{UserInfoQtalk.dep5},pinyin=hanzi_to_pinyin(#{UserInfoQtalk.user_name}), hire_flag=#{UserInfoQtalk.hire_flag},version=#{UserInfoQtalk.version},gender = #{UserInfoQtalk.gender};
mapper.update: update host_users SET frozen_flag=0, user_name=#{UserInfoQtalk.user_name}, hire_flag=#{UserInfoQtalk.hire_flag}, department=#{UserInfoQtalk.department}, dep1=#{UserInfoQtalk.dep1}, dep2=#{UserInfoQtalk.dep2}, dep3=#{UserInfoQtalk.dep3}, dep4=#{UserInfoQtalk.dep4}, dep5=#{UserInfoQtalk.dep5}, ps_deptid=#{UserInfoQtalk.ps_deptid}, version=#{UserInfoQtalk.version}, user_type=#{UserInfoQtalk.user_type}, gender=#{UserInfoQtalk.gender}, email = #{UserInfoQtalk.email} WHERE user_id=#{UserInfoQtalk.user_id} and host_id=1;
